nature.description: indicates whether the lighting information corresponds to physical light, virtual light, both, or unknown.

position.description: position of both light and reflection probes associated with the lighting information

projection.description: provides the projection type of the specular images

rotation_accessor.description: provides a reference to the accessor giving a sequence of quaternions

intensity_accessor.description: provides a reference to the accessor giving a sequence of intensity values

irradiance_accessor.description: provides a reference to the accessor giving a sequence of irradiance coefficient samples

specular_images.description: provides a list of references to textures providing specular images (environment maps)
